tika-abh07t6:3_1: Akusalasaṅgaho missakasaṅgaho bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho sabbasaṅgaho ceti samuccayasaṅgaho catubbidho veditabbo.
tika-abh07t6:5_1: Akusalasaṅgahe tāva cattāro āsavā – kāmāsavo bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo.
tika-abh07t6:6_1: Cattāro oghā – kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho.
tika-abh07t6:7_1: Cattāro yogā – kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogo.
tika-abh07t6:9_1: Cattāro upādānā – kāmupādānaṁ diṭṭhupādānaṁ sīlabbatupādānaṁ attavādupādānaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:10_1: Cha nīvaraṇāni – kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṁ byāpādanīvaraṇaṁ thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṁ uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṁ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṁ avijjānīvaraṇaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:11_1: Satta anusayā – kāmarāgānusayo bhavarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo avijjānusayo.
tika-abh07t6:12_1: Dasa saṁyojanāni – kāmarāgasaṁyojanaṁ rūparāgasaṁyojanaṁ arūparāgasaṁyojanaṁ paṭighasaṁyojanaṁ mānasaṁyojanaṁ diṭṭhisaṁyojanaṁ sīlabbataparāmāsasaṁyojanaṁ vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ uddhaccasaṁyojanaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ suttante.
tika-abh07t6:13_1: Aparānipi dasa saṁyojanāni – kāmarāgasaṁyojanaṁ bhavarāgasaṁyojanaṁ paṭighasaṁyojanaṁ mānasaṁyojanaṁ diṭṭhisaṁyojanaṁ sīlabbataparāmāsasaṁyojanaṁ vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ issāsaṁyojanaṁ macchariyasaṁyojanaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ abhidhamme (vibha. 969).
tika-abh07t6:14_1: Dasa kilesā – lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:15_1: Āsavādīsu panettha kāmabhavanāmena tabbatthukā taṇhā adhippetā,
tika-abh07t6:15_2: sīlabbataparāmāso idaṁsaccābhiniveso attavādupādo ca tathāpavattaṁ diṭṭhigatameva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t6:23_0: 15.Missakasaṅgahe cha hetū – lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho.
tika-abh07t6:24_1: Satta jhānaṅgāni – vitakko vicāro pīti ekaggatā somanassaṁ domanassaṁ upekkhā.
tika-abh07t6:25_1: Dvādasa maggaṅgāni – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi.
tika-abh07t6:26_1: Bāvīsatindriyāni – cakkhundriyaṁ sotindriyaṁ ghānindriyaṁ jivhindriyaṁ kāyindriyaṁ itthindriyaṁ purisindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ manindriyaṁ sukhindriyaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ aññindriyaṁ aññātāvindriyaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:27_1: Nava balāni – saddhābalaṁ vīriyabalaṁ satibalaṁ samādhibalaṁ paññābalaṁ hiribalaṁ ottappabalaṁ ahirikabalaṁ anottappabalaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:28_1: Cattāro adhipatī – chandādhipati vīriyādhipati cittādhipati vīmaṁsādhipati.
tika-abh07t6:29_1: Cattāro āhārā – kabaḷīkāro āhāro, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṁ catutthaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:35_1: Tathā vicikicchācitte ekaggatā maggindriyabalabhāvaṁ na gacchati.
tika-abh07t6:37_0: 29. Cha hetū pañca jhānaṅgā, maggaṅgā nava vatthuto.
tika-abh07t6:42_0: 30.Bodhipakkhiyasaṅgahe cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:43_1: Cattāro sammappadhānā uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ pahānāya vāyāmo,
tika-abh07t6:44_1: Cattāro iddhipādā – chandiddhipādo vīriyiddhipādo cittiddhipādo vīmaṁsiddhipādo.
tika-abh07t6:45_1: Pañcindriyāni – saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:46_1: Pañca balāni – saddhābalaṁ vīriyabalaṁ satibalaṁ samādhibalaṁ paññābalaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:47_1: Satta bojjhaṅgā – satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo pītisambojjhaṅgo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo samādhisambojjhaṅgo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
tika-abh07t6:48_1: Aṭṭha maggaṅgāni – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
tika-abh07t6:49_1: Ettha pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti sammāsati ekāva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t6:61_0: 41. Sabbe lokuttare honti, na vā saṅkappapītiyo.
tika-abh07t6:64_0: 42.Sabbasaṅgahe pañcakkhandhā – rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
tika-abh07t6:65_1: Pañcupādānakkhandhā – rūpupādānakkhandho vedanupādānakkhandho saññupādānakkhandho saṅkhārupādānakkhandho viññāṇupādānakkhandho.
tika-abh07t6:66_1: Dvādasāyatanāni – cakkhāyatanaṁ sotāyatanaṁ ghānāyatanaṁ jivhāyatanaṁ kāyāyatanaṁ manāyatanaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ.
tika-abh07t6:67_1: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu rūpadhātu saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu ghānaviññāṇadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu dhammadhātu manoviññāṇadhātu.
tika-abh07t6:68_1: Cattāri ariyasaccāni – dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṁ,
tika-abh07t6:69_1: Ettha pana cetasikasukhumarūpanibbānavasena ekūnasattati dhammā dhammāyatanadhammadhātūti saṅkhaṁ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t6:77_0: 52. Dukkhaṁ tebhūmakaṁ vaṭṭaṁ, taṇhā samudayo bhave.
tika-abh07t6:78_0: Nirodho nāma nibbānaṁ, maggo lokuttaro mato.
